name: Mastery Talisman: Formation Assault
description:
When your character uses an Elemental Burst: Spend 3 less Elemental Dice. (Once per Round)
After your characters take DMG or are healed: This card gains 1 "Formation" point. If this card already has 5 "Formation" points, consume 5 points, and cause all of your characters to gain 1 Energy.

(Once per Round)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After your characters take DMG or are healed:</color> This card gains 1 "Formation" point. If this card already has 5 "Formation" points, consume 5 points, and cause all of your characters to gain 1 $[K310].
